Introduction

Jimin is a South Korean singer and actress signed with GKMNEO Entertainment. She has been part of several groups, including MuuTive, I&Girls, and A-Dean, and was part of the trainee lineups for YOURS and DMZA. Jimin was also set to participate in the survival show Find Rookie.

Before her K-pop career, she was a member of the dance team April from 2012 to 2013. She announced plans to expand her activities in China, Japan, and Thailand following her K-pop debut in late 2021.
